programme.desc: Réitíonn Posy agus Jamila deoch rúnda nuair a bhíonn siad féin agus a gcairde ag ligean orthu féin gur cailleacha iad. (Posy and Jamila concoct a secret potion.)

programme.title: Olobob Top
programme.desc: Tá clúmhach Bobble ar fud na foraoise. Beidh cúnamh ag teastáil ó na hOlobobanna é a ghlanadh. (Bobble causes a flood of fluff all over the forest.)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Caithfidh Owlette an fhírinne a insint sula n-inseoidh Cailín Luna do Catboy agus Gekko céard go díreach a tharla. (Owlette accidentally breaks the lens of the telescope.)

programme.title: Wussywat
programme.desc: Foghlaimíonn Wussywat go bhfuil sé go deas a bheith ag spraoi in éineacht le do chuid cairde. (Wussywat discovers playing with her friends can be fun.)

programme.title: Clifford
programme.desc: Tosaíonn ár gcairde ag tógáil grianghraf den oileán le cur sa mbróisiúr nua. (Emily Elizabeth and friends set out to help Samantha capture the essence of Birdwell Island.)

programme.title: Woozle & Pip
programme.desc: Tá Woozle ag iarraidh a bheith ina shárlaoch! (Woozle wants to be a superhero.)

programme.title: Vegesaurs
programme.desc: Tá Ginger agus na Piseanna-Rex óga ag iarraidh Abhacádón óg a thabhairt abhaile. (Ginger and the Pea-Rexes guide a lively baby Avocadodon back to its herd after it hatches.)

programme.title: Dot
programme.desc: Ní maith le Dot go bhfuil bruscar ar an trá. (Dot is not happy when she sees rubbish on the beach.)

programme.title: Ella Bella Bingo
programme.desc: Feiceann Henry, Lottie agus Lisa duine éigin sa ghairdín, ach cé atá ann? (Henry, Lisa and Lottie see someone in the garden, but disagree as to who it is.)

programme.title: Cúla4
programme.desc: Níl aon easpa cláracha do dhaoine óga ar Cúla4 - bí ag spraoi agus ag foghlaim in éineacht linn. (Younger audiences will be spoilt for choice with Cúla4 - watch, play and learn.)

programme.title: Charlie agus Lola
programme.desc: Ní maith le Lola nuair a bhíonn daoine eile ag iarraidh cúnamh a thabhairt di caisleán gainimh a dhéanamh. (Lola is annoyed when other people try to help build her sandcastle.)

programme.title: Petronix Defenders
programme.desc: Tá Jia agus Matt ag iarraidh giuirléid nua a úsáid le galágónna a shábháil. (Jia and Matt want to use their new gadget to rescue a pair of high-bouncing Bush Babies.)

programme.title: Pat an Madra
programme.desc: Tá gadhar eile ag ligean air féin gurb é Pat é. (Pat is replaced by an imposter dog.)

programme.title: Angelo Rules
programme.desc: Cuirtear an clár teilifíse is fearr le Peadar agus Cooper ar ceal. (Peter and Cooper's favourite TV show is cancelled.)

programme.title: Dónall Dána
programme.desc: Tarraingíonn Dónall raic nuair a imíonn Mamaí agus Daidí don deireadh seachtaine. Henry causes trouble when his Mom and Dad go away for the weekend.

programme.title: Cúla4
programme.desc: Níl aon easpa cláracha do dhaoine óga ar Cúla4 - bí ag spraoi agus ag foghlaim in éineacht linn. (Younger audiences will be spoilt for choice with Cúla4 - watch, play and learn.)

programme.title: Super Simple Amhráin
programme.desc: Amhrán spraíúil faoi fhéileacán, bóín Dé agus bumbóg a bheidh againn inniu. (A fun song about a Butterfly, a Ladybug & a Bumblebee.)

programme.title: Blocuimhreacha
programme.desc: Tá Sorcas na dTríonna ag cur taispeántas ar siúl! (The Circus of Threes is putting on a show.)

programme.title: Blocdhathanna
programme.desc: Faigheann Corcra cúnamh óna chairde chun bailchríoch a chur ar a múrphictiúr. (Purple gets lots of help from his friends as he tries to give his Mural a makeover.)

programme.title: Na Blociontais
programme.desc: Tagann Arís i gcabhair ar Bhuaf. (Again comes to Toad's aid.)

programme.title: Pompon An Béirín Beag
programme.desc: Castar Pompon, Súil na Lincse, an sealgaire mór dusta orainn inniu. Ní fhágfaidh sé dusta in áit ar bith! (Today, we meet Pompom, Eye of The Lynx, the great dust hunter.)

programme.title: Scéal an Lae
programme.desc: Is í Tara Breathnach a bheidh ag léamh scéal an lae inniu. (Today's story of the day is read by Tara Breathnach.)

programme.title: Pip & Posy
programme.desc: Bíonn Pip agus Posy ag súil le sneachta ach ní thagann sé. (Pip and Posy wake up disappointed when the snow they expected hasn't come.)

programme.title: Scoil Bheag Helen
programme.desc: Tá cluiche nua cumtha ag Helen do na daltaí: tóraíocht dathanna. (Helen has invented a new game for her toy-students: a colour quest.)

programme.title: Scoil Bheag Helen
programme.desc: Níl Helen ábalta roghnú idir dhá ghníomhaíocht. (Today Helen can't decide between two activities.)

programme.title: True agus Ríocht an Bhogha Ceatha
programme.desc: Téann True agus Beartla ar thuras contúirteach chun teacht ar leigheas ar shraoth cosmach an Rí. (True and Beartla search of a cure for the Rainbow King's cosmic sneezes.)

programme.title: Nuair a Bheidh Mé Mór
programme.desc: Samhlaíonn Isabelle a saol ina radharceolaí nuair a bheidh sí mór, le cúnamh ó Shióg na bPost. (Isabelle imagines her life as an optician when she grows up.)

programme.title: Zou
programme.desc: Cuidíonn Zou agus Daideo le hUncail Zavier inniu. (Zou and Grandpa help Uncle Zavier today.)

programme.title: Dee Dee
programme.desc: Is bleachtaire í Mewmew inniu. (Mewmew is a detective today and is looking for a mystery to solve.)

programme.title: Daisy & Ollie
programme.desc: Téann Daisy chuig a céad tástáil súl agus míníonn an radharceolaí di faoi mar a dhéantar na súile a thástáil. (Daisy goes for her first eye test.)

programme.title: Ainmhithe Craiceáilte
programme.desc: Marmait machaire fhiosracha, gadhair spraíúla, gadhar an phoist agus broc meala a bheidh againn inniu. (Today we'll see curious prairie dogs, playful puppy dogs & honey badgers.)

programme.title: Comhrá
programme.desc: Is é Tommy Jim Mac Gearailt as Cill Chúile i gCiarraí a bheidh ag comhrá le Máirtín an tseachtain seo. (Tommy Jim Mac Gearailt from Cill Chúile joins Máirtín this week.)

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Faigheann Blanche fear do Dorothy le dul in éineacht léi ar bhainis. (Blanche supplies a date for wedding-bound Dorothy.)

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Tá an tsuim mhór atá ag Dorothy sa gcearrbhachas ag cur imní ar Sophia. (Dorothy's gambling addiction worries Sophia and Blanche dates a co-worker.)

programme.title: Geantraí
programme.desc: Is as teach tábhairne Thír na nÓg i Nua-Eabhrac a chraoladh an clár seo den chead uair in 2003. (This episode of Geantraí, first broadcast in 2003, is coming to you from New York.)

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote
programme.desc: Cuirtear isteach ar thuras Jessica go Hong Cong nuair a dhúnmharaítear fear gnó as Meiriceá. (Jessica's trip to Hong Kong is interrupted by the murder of an American businessman.)

programme.title: Scoil Cheoil an Earraigh
programme.desc: An clár deiridh ó Scoil Cheoil an Earraigh 2025. Á chur i láthair ag Pádraig Ó Sé. (The last programme from Scoil Cheoil an Earraigh 2025 with Pádraig Ó Sé.)

programme.title: Grand Tours of Scotland
programme.desc: Tugann Paul aghaidh ar Garbhchríocha na hAlban ar sheanrothar. (Paul travels by vintage bike through the spectacular scenery of the central highlands.)

programme.title: Glór Tíre Rogha & Togha
programme.desc: Beidh scoth an cheoil tíre ar an gclár seo. I measc na gceoltóirí beidh Dana, Gene Stuart, Gary Gamble agus Philip McGee. (Featuring in the final show are Dana, Gene Stuart, and Philip McGee.)

programme.title: Shark Tank
programme.desc: Cuireann fiontraithe uaillmhianacha a gcuid smaointe os comhair na "Siorcanna". (Aspiring entrepreneurs pitch their business ideas to moguls, known as the "Sharks".)
